properties.name: requireExpiry
properties.description: Set to true to require expiry date

properties.name: requireCVV
properties.description: The user will be prompted for the card CVV

properties.name: requirePostalCode
properties.description: The user will be prompted for the card billing postal code.

properties.name: supressManual
properties.description: Removes the keyboard button from the scan screen.

properties.name: restrictPostalCodeToNumericOnly
properties.description: The postal code will only collect numeric input. Set this if you know the expected country's postal code has only numeric postal codes.

properties.name: keepApplicationTheme
properties.description: The theme for the card.io Activity's will be set to the theme of the application.

properties.name: requireCardholderName
properties.description: The user will be prompted for the cardholder name

properties.name: scanInstructions
properties.description: Used to display instructions to the user while they are scanning their card.

properties.name: noCamera
properties.description: If set, the card will not be scanned with the camera.

properties.name: scanExpiry
properties.description: If scanExpiry is true, an attempt to extract the expiry from the card image will be made.

properties.name: languageOrLocale
properties.description: The preferred language for all strings appearing in the user interface. If not set, or if set to null, defaults to the device's current language setting.

properties.name: guideColor
properties.description: Changes the color of the guide overlay on the camera. The color is provided in hexadecimal format (e.g. `#FFFFFF`)

properties.name: supressConfirmation
properties.description: The user will not be prompted to confirm their card number after processing.

properties.name: hideCardIOLogo
properties.description: The card.io logo will not be shown overlaid on the camera.

properties.name: useCardIOLogo
properties.description: The card.io logo will be shown instead of the PayPal logo.

properties.name: supressScan
properties.description: Once a card image has been captured but before it has been processed, this value will determine whether to continue processing as usual.
